title: San Francisco/Union Square-Financial District
name: Bangkok Noodles
content: Cash only "hole in the wall" restaurant serving delicious and nicely presented Thai dishes ranging from noodles, stir fried, to BBQ.  Attracts a large local following from young Asian Americans.  Lunch hour gets crowded in this small popular eatery; alternative is to take out and eat in Union Square.  It's great for a good and cheap early or late-night dinner.
